The problem gives a large list of pairwise relationships: each line states that someone is an ancestor or descendant of another. For instance "Donna is Ralph's ancestor." Or "Ronald is Dorothy's descendant." The relationships provided are "ancestor" meaning the first person is an ancestor of the second (i.e., first is older / higher in family tree) and "descendant" meaning first person is a descendant of the second (i.e., second is older). So "A is B's ancestor" => A -> ... -> B; "A is B's descendant" => B -> ... -> A.
